room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: We tried the Prision Escape and also the Night in Vegas. It was a blast, the staff was great and helped make our adventure even more fun. If your in Atlanta this is a must do.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: This was my second escape room but first one here. Had a blast. Did the prison one, the jumpsuits really do add a little flair to the experience. Also, Cesar gave great advice and was very helpful. I will definitely be there again with friends and family.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: Had a blast! We did both Prison and Virus. The story lines were clear and the rooms were very detailed. We had a group of 5 and all of us had a great time!
